title: Tell me before my moneys already wasted
body: Any body know when the new SG skins gonna be coming out please be quick before i waist my money on the project skins....wait... eh oh its to late.

replies.body:
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/953/651/e82.gif

Oh wait, wrong reference. My bad. :P

Unfortunately, I have no information on new or unreleased content until it actually happens.  Any details will be posted on our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page.  The guardians could be enduring a saga of epic proportions, and saving us from the darkest timeline.  Send your energy to the lights of the First Star, so they may burn with brilliance!

I'll make sure to stalk the sales page thx man! also here is my energy 

                                                                     //////O    <----Energy 
                                                                       (/OI0)/
They'll be out next patch. We don't have a definite date, but at the very least you won't be seeing them until the next patch hits us. I would expect them to be out early in the patch cycle though.

I suppose I should mention, there is always the chance they won't pop up next patch if there is some sort of technical problem with the skins.

I doubt this will happen, it's incredibly rare, so you can likely expect them sooner rather than later.
